patterns.pattern: (^Lurching forward with violent momentum, \w+ slams? \w+ fist into (\w+)'s gut without mercy\.$|^Your fist collides with (\w+) but carries little momentum, barely a fraction of your true strength\.$)
(^The sheer force of .+ haymaker strikes at (\w+)'s organs, causing a massive internal bleed\.$|^Lacking sufficient force, your blow causes only minor wounding\.$)
^(\w+) gasps in pain, \w+ (.+) shattering under the assault\.$
^(\w+) doubles over as \w+ ribs crack under the remorseless strike\.$
^(\w+)'s throat seizes up from the force of the blow\.$
^Rebounding with aggres?sive agility, (\w+) forces \w+ back to \w+ feet.$
^(\w+) winces as the contusion plaguing \w+ (.+) throbs from duress\.

name: Branding / Infernal Seal Ablaze

patterns.pattern: ^The Infernal Seal upon (\w+) flares sharply, setting \w+ ablaze.$

script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then
  snd.target_got("ablaze")  
  if snd.checkAff("ablaze")  then
    snd.flamestack = snd.flamestack + 1
  end
end 
if (snd.class == "Zealot" or snd.class == "Ravager") and matches[2] == snd.target and snd.flamestack > 0 then
  cecho("\n"..snd.target.." Now has <light_goldenrod>"..snd.flamestack.."<dodger_blue> stacks of intensity")
end

name: Branding / Infernal Shroud

patterns.pattern: ^The Infernal Seal on (\w+)'s chest releases a shower of holy flame, blanketing the air about \w+ with a burning shroud\.$
^Flames creep up (\w+)'s magical shield from within, \w+ burning shroud consuming it in an instant\.$

script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then
  snd.target_got("infernal_seal")
  snd.target_got("infernal_shroud")
  tempTimer(125, [[snd.target_cured("infernal_seal")]])
  tempTimer(125, [[snd.target_cured("infernal_shroud")]])
  snd.target_got("ablaze")
end 
if (snd.class == "Zealot" or snd.class == "Ravager") and matches[2] == snd.target and snd.flamestack > 0 then
  cecho("\n"..snd.target.." Now has <light_goldenrod>"..snd.flamestack.."<dodger_blue> stacks of intensity")
end
